comment.author: 9476071@N03
comment._content:
If i was going to bury a time capsule and I wanted to show what 1920's music was all about i would certaintly include Paul Whiteman. Also Ben Bernie and of course Louis Armstrong. At least these three if I were limited to space.

The 1920s had the best music and the worst liquor. Now we have good liquor and the worst music.
